import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-store-page', templateUrl: './store-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./store-page.component.scss'] }) export class StorePageComponent { storeNames = ['Mesa | Country Club', 'Store 2', 'Store 3', 'Store 4']; storeManager = ['Jaysen Northern', 'Manager 2', 'Manager 3', 'Manager 4']; storeHours = ['helloworld', 'Hours 2', 'Hours 3', 'Hours 4']; storeAddress = ['1440 S. Country Club Drive Mesa, AZ 85210, Suite 26', 'Address 2', 'Address 3', 'Address 4']; storePhone = ['480-833-1226', 'Phone 2', 'Phone 3', 'Phone 4']; afterHours = ['(480)-540-3709', 'After Hours 2', 'After Hours 3', 'After Hours 4']; lunchSchedule = ['Tuesday 11:00AM - 1:00PM', 'Lunch Schedule 2', 'Lunch Schedule 3', 'Lunch Schedule 4']; apiUrl = 'https://www.google.com/maps/embed?pb=!1m18!1m12!1m3!1d3330.821547427711!2d-111.8522486848018!3d33.39373798079263!2m3!1f0!2f0!3f0!3m2!1i1024!2i768!4f13.1!3m3!1m2!1e3!2s1440+S+Country+Club+Dr+%2326%2C+Mesa%2C+AZ+85210!5e0!3m2!1sen!2sus!4v1561398458809!5m2!1sen!2sus'; storeDistance = ['0.0', '3.2', '8.2', '6.7']; }

We're located at {{storeAddress[0]}} in Chandler, AZ. Stock up on wholesale plumbing products with ease and convenience. At Van Marcke, you will have a wide range of quality plumbing brands including, Ruud Water Heaters, American Standard, Delta, Moen, Grundfos, Milwaukee, Zoeller, and A.Y. McDonald at a super competitive price. To see all of the brands and products that we carry, check out our Line Card.


You can also enjoy the added value through our shop stock, truck stop, and private label services. These services are designed to provide the maximum level of convenience and efficiency, allowing your plumbing technicians to spend less time getting the needed supplies for their next job, and more time getting jobs done. You can get additional information about our extraordinary value-added plumbing supply services on our services page.


At Van Marcke Plumbing Supply, you will find some of the best deals on quality plumbing parts, incredible events, and top-notch product training on some of the newest and most popular products in the trade.Click here for a list of our upcoming events. Additionally you can sign up to receive current specials, exclusive discounts, giveaways, and event updates via email here.
